Protons to Pixels

Protons to Pixels was a freelance project taken up during the summer of 2016.

Protons to Pixels is a platform to meet, discover, and interact with social influencers around the globe. Using various design technologies, I brought the entire concept to life — creating an interactive website, a PHP based backend, customised interactive maps using the Google Maps API, along with designing a weekly online newspaper and taking care of branding.

The site can be seen live here.

Role

{{role}}

The landing page, with an animated pixel theme in the background, signifying connection.

Signup page, with options to sign up as an influencer or a regular user.

An interactive map, with pins marking influencers around the globe.

A sample influencer view, with options to follow the influencer and view and share their story.

An influencer's profile, with options to edit bio, add social media intergation, and upload stories.
